headlines.description: — Nathan MacKinnon scored twice, and celebrated his second goal with a stick twirl and fist pump, in the Colorado Avalanche’s 3-1 victory over the winless Buffalo Sabres on Monday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Nathan MacKinnon scores twice in the Avalanche's 3-1 victory over winless Sabres

events.name: Tampa Bay Lightning at Boston Bruins

headlines.description: — Pontus Holmberg put Tampa Bay up by three goals late in the second period and the Lightning held on to beat the Boston Bruins 4-3 on Monday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pontus Holmberg scores one and Anthony Cirelli puts in two more as Lightning beat Bruins 4-3

headlines.description: — Juuse Saros made 31 saves to lead the Nashville Predators to a 4-1 win over the Ottawa Senators on Monday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Saros makes 31 saves, Nashville Predators beat Ottawa Senators 4-1

events.name: Winnipeg Jets at New York Islanders

headlines.description: — Jonathan Toews recorded his first point in nearly 2 1/2 years on an assist, and the Winnipeg Jets had five different players score goals in a 5-2 win...
headlines.shortLinkText: Toews gets 1st point in 2 1/2 years, Jets have 5 players score in win over Islanders

events.name: Detroit Red Wings at Toronto Maple Leafs

headlines.description: — Mason Appleton scored the winner with 44.1 seconds left in regulation and Cam Talbot made 38 saves as the Detroit Red Wings survived a blown two-goal lead in the third period to defeat the Toronto Maple Leafs 3-2 on Monday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mason Appleton scores in the final minute to lift the Red Wings over the Maple Leafs 3-2

headlines.description: — Sean Couturier’s second goal of the game with 4:10 remaining snapped a tie and sent the Philadelphia Flyers to a 5-2 win over the Florida Panthers on Monday night in Rick Tocchet's home coaching debut.
headlines.shortLinkText: Couturier scores twice and secures Flyers' 5-2 win over Panthers in Tocchet's home coaching debut

events.name: New Jersey Devils at Columbus Blue Jackets

headlines.description: — Timo Meier and Dawson Mercer each scored in the final seconds of power plays to lift the New Jersey Devils over the Columbus Blue Jackets 3-2 on Monday night, securing their second straight road win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Timo Meier, Dawson Mercer power Devils past Blue Jackets 3-2 for second straight road win

events.name: Los Angeles Kings at Minnesota Wild

headlines.description: — Marco Rossi scored in the fourth round of the shootout and the Minnesota Wild beat the Los Angeles Kings 4-3 Monday night after giving up a three-goal lead in the third period.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rossi gets shootout winner, Wild beat Kings 4-3 after allowing trio of third-period goals

headlines.description: — Andre Burakovsky snapped a third-period tie, and the Chicago Blackhawks beat the Utah Mammoth 3-1 on Monday night for coach Jeff Blashill’s first win with his new team.
headlines.shortLinkText: Burakovsky scores as Chicago beats the Utah Mammoth 3-1 for Blashill's first win with the Blackhawks
